post.description:
Contact Orum for access to an Orum Portal account, where you can set up your login credentials.

Use this /oauth/token endpoint to exchange API credentials created in the Portal (client_id and client_secret) for an access_token.

To authenticate to all protected Orum endpoints, pass the access_token in the Authorization header Bearer ${token}.
The auth token is valid for one hour.

addresses.description: Incorporated address information for the business. Note: This field is required for payouts, deposits, or account-to-account transfers. Orum requires a physical address for all registered businesses; aligned with standards mandated by FinCEN and the FDIC. A physical address is a tangible building address, such as a home, office, or office suite. A PO Box is a mailing address, but not a physical address.

x-orum-error-invalid.message: Addresses array is invalid. Pass an array containing an address object.

contacts.description: List of contact information for the business. 'email', 'phone', or 'website' are required. A maximum of three persons or businesses can have the same phone number.

x-orum-error-invalid.message: Contacts array is invalid. Pass an array of contact information containing phone, website, and/or email contact types.

legal_name.description: The legal name of the business as it appears on official registration forms. Accepts alphanumeric characters and hyphens, dashes, periods, apostrophes, spaces, hashes, colons, forward slashes, and diacritics.

business_name.description: A trade name or pseudonym used by the business that is not its officially registered company name. Accepts alphanumeric characters and hyphens, dashes, periods, apostrophes, spaces, hashes, colons, forward slashes, and diacritics.

entity_type.description: Describes the type of business entity.

tax_id.description: 9-digit corporate tax id of business - can be Taxpayer Identification Number (TIN) or Employer Identification Number (EIN). Note: This field is required for payouts, deposits, or account-to-account transfers.

tax_id_type.description: The type of tax ID number associated with the business. Note: This field is required for payouts, deposits, or account-to-account transfers.

account_holder_name.description: Name of the owner or primary person associated with the business.

incorporation_date.description: Date the business was incorporated, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

addresses.description: Incorporated address information for the business. Note: This field is required for payouts, deposits, or account-to-account transfers. Orum requires a physical address for all registered businesses; aligned with standards mandated by FinCEN and the FDIC. A physical address is a tangible building address, such as a home, office, or office suite. A PO Box is a mailing address, but not a physical address.

contacts.description: List of contact information for the business.

metadata.description: Additional data you would like to provide on the resource. The field supports valid JSON of up to 5 key-value pairs with a maximum of 20 characters for the key and 50 characters for the value. Do not include any sensitive information.

DateOfBirth.title: DateOfBirth
DateOfBirth.description: Date of birth in YYYY-MM-DD format. Note: This field is required for payouts, deposits, or account-to-account transfers. Age must be less than 100 years and greater than 18 years to be verified.

SocialSecurityNumber.title: SocialSecurityNumber
SocialSecurityNumber.description: Social Security Number (SSN) or Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) in XXX-XX-XXXX format. An example dummy value is 123-45-6789. Note: This field is required for payouts, deposits, or account-to-account transfers.

reason_code.description: A word-based code created by Orum to describe the reason for the failure. Orum reason codes are rail-agnostic.

RTPEligible.description: Describes if the routing number is RTP eligible or not

FednowEligible.description: Describes if the routing number is Fednow eligible or not

TransferGroupReferenceID.title: TransferGroupReferenceID
TransferGroupReferenceID.description: Unique reference id for the transfer group

TransferGroupSourceObject.title: Source

account_reference_id.description: Unique id of the account on the Enterprise platform

customer_reference_id.description: Unique id of the customer on the Enterprise platform

TransferGroupSourceObject.description: Information about the ultimate source of the transfer group.

TransferGroupDestinationObject.title: Destination

account_reference_id.description: Unique id of the account on the Enterprise platform

customer_reference_id.description: Unique id of the customer on the Enterprise platform

TransferGroupDestinationObject.description: Information about the ultimate destination of the transfer group.

pending.description: Pending amount of the balance in integral cents (example: 100 = $1).

available.description: Available amount of the balance in integral cents (example: 100 = $1).

AccountBalances.title: AccountBalances
AccountBalances.description: Open and close balances for an account.

LedgerEntryBalance.description: Ledger entries with type and debit/credit balances.

StartTime.description: The start time of the report range in ISO-8601 format.

EndTime.description: The end time of the report range in ISO-8601 format.

x-orum-error-invalid.message: Type is invalid. Pass in either 'status', 'control', 'status_ownership' or 'control_ownership'.

x-orum-error-missing.message: Account number is required. Pass an account number with 17 digits or fewer.

x-orum-error-invalid.message: Account number is invalid. Pass an account number with 17 digits or fewer.

x-orum-error-missing.message: Routing number is required. Pass a valid 9-digit routing number.

x-orum-error-invalid.message: Routing number is invalid. Pass a valid 9-digit routing number.

x-orum-error-missing.message: Account holder name is required.

x-orum-error-invalid.message: Account holder name is invalid. Accepted values are letters, numbers, spaces, hyphens, apostrophes, periods and diacritics.

x-orum-error-missing.message: Email is required.

x-orum-error-invalid.message: Email address provided is invalid.

x-orum-error-missing.message: Statement code is required. Pass the statement code from the account statement descriptor.

x-orum-error-invalid.message: Statement code is invalid. Pass the statement code from the account statement descriptor.

x-orum-error-missing.message: First name is required.

x-orum-error-invalid.message: First name is invalid.

x-orum-error-missing.message: Last name is required.

x-orum-error-invalid.message: Last Name is invalid.

StatusReason.description: Status reason for failed, invalid, and closed accounts.

DebitStatusReason.description: Status reason for failed and blocked accounts.

EstimatedVerificationDate.description: Estimated date that the account verification will be complete. Time will always be midnight and should be ignored.

StatementCode.title: StatementCode
StatementCode.description: Text from the account statement descriptor to verify account control.

Email.description: Email address to notify once the statement code is sent to the account to verify account control.

bearerAuth.description: The auth token received from Authentication endpoints.
